name: Archer
description:
Take on the role of a marksman Archer and adventure through Mount Doom's caverns. Careful, the slumbering dragon may not let you pass without first playing his games. Archery is a skill easy to learn yet difficult to master!

Archer is the first game in Tim Beaudet's Indie Adventure, it is a rather short game with few levels that took a lot of effort to come together. By purchasing Archer, you are supporting Tim's efforts to make games independently, something he aspires to do full-time.
